description: Earthy celeriac replaces potato in this classic soup which can be ready in 20 minutes.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Celeriac & Leek Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil and butter in a large, deep saucepan on medium low heat and gently cook the leeks for 3-4 minutes, add the chopped celeriac, garlic, nutmeg and thyme and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in in the stock, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes until the celeriac is tender.
Blend well until smooth with an immersion blender. For an extra smooth soup, pass through a fine sieve, pushing any remaining chunks through with the back of a spoon.
Stir in the mustard, divide between 4 bowls, top with parsley and serve.
